tweezer.statistics package¶

Submodules¶

tweezer.statistics.wlc_models module¶

Statistics and fitting routines related to polymer models

tweezer.statistics.wlc_models.fit_wlc(fitData)[source]¶

Fits the extensible worm-like chain model to data

Parameters:fitData –

Module contents¶

Module concerned with statistics and fitting of data.

Also concerns the parameter estimation with maximum likelihood methods.
